wrath.test.client

Class CustomGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.client.Game
      • wrath.test.client.CustomGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntryObject, GameEventHandler

    public class CustomGame
extends Game
implements GameEventHandler, EntryObject
    Example game for testing the engine. Extends Game class.
